content:
The fourth annual Rhythm on the River Festival was held at Big Dogs on the River in Athens Georgia on Sunday July   PERIOD Rhythm on the River is a fundraiser hosted for Chess and Community a mentoring program created by Lemuel LaRoche that featured chess games music spoken word and kayaking PERIOD

Photos by Tony Walsh
